messages.subject: First day, adjustments and questions
messages.msgSnippet: Now that these time ... Live like school does not exist. You re now simply and gloriously LIVING...school has no part of your world anymore, right?:) As you
messages.messageBody:
"Now that these time
> periods no longer exist, ie school time is all the
> time and free time is all the time because school is
> free time, I'm making adjustments)."

Live like school does not exist. You're now simply and gloriously
LIVING...school has no part of your world anymore, right?:)

As you journey into trusting your children more and more, you'll
probably find that it naturally causes you to question any and
all "limits". There are natural limits in life, and there are
arbitrary limits...I bet you'll start seeing less and less need for
arbitrary limits as you keep on trusting and learning with them.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
